name: Desert Stalker
description:
Play as a horrifying creature of the night. Wander the empty desert in a futile search for victims.  Become beautiful and terrifying.

This is my first game! I made this game in 2018 using the  Chili DirectX Framework by ChiliTomatoNoodle. The game was made for Ludum Dare 41 for the theme "combine two incompatible genres." it's a Horror Western
